dct_title_s: A large Draught of the Mallabar coast : from Bassalore to Cape Comaroone.
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,250,000 ; (E 74째18'00"--E 77째39'00"/N 13째25'00"--N 7째59'00"). Depths shown by soundings. Likely from: Sea-Atlas by Samuel Thornton. In corner on verso: 24. Oriented with north to the left. Flags indicate which nations have factories along the coast. Dimensions: 43 x 53 centimeters
dcat_keyword_sm: Nautical Charts India Malabar Coast Early Works to 1800
